evidence.claim: Luminary Hospice adheres to HIPAA standards for patient data protection.
The organization utilizes HL7 FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Comprehensive patient data handling in line with HIPAA regulations is a core aspect of Luminary's services.
The company maintains compliance with EDI transaction standards for healthcare communication.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or API automation related to clearinghouse services found.
